data.quote: Challenges are what makes life interesting, and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful
data.author: Joshua J. Marine

data.quote: The way you tell your story to yourself matters
data.author: Amy Cuddy

data.quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Good judgement comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgement
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Your dreams don't work unless you do
data.author: Jhon C. Maxwell

data.quote: Go beyond yourself rather than beyond others
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible. Then, they seem improbable. And then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable
data.author: Christopher Reeve

data.quote: A ship in a harbour is safe - but that is not what ships are built for
data.author: Jhon A. Shedd

data.quote: As you think, so shall you become
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: The only way to learn it, is to do it
data.author: Archimedes, "Sword in the Stone"

data.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you are right
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: Never give up. Never let things out of your control dictate who you are
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think
data.author: A. A. Milne

data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard
data.author: Tim Notke

data.quote: Forget all the reasons why it won't work and believe the one reason why it will
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
data.author: Paul Carus

data.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you
data.author: Mary Lou Retton

data.quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame
data.author: Erica Jong

data.quote: Your big oportunity may be right where you are now
data.author: Napoleon Hill
